mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.title, a.author, a.create_time FROM tb_article a, tb_category c, tb_article_category ac WHERE c.id = #{id} AND c.id = ac.category_id AND a.id = ac.article_id;
SELECT a.id, a.title, a.author, a.create_time FROM tb_article a, tb_tag t, tb_article_tag at WHERE t.id = #{id} AND t.id = at.tag_id AND a.id = at.article_id;
